fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Single market, Public Health, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
- Financial resilience throughout life 
- cross-border insolvency 
- cashless society 
- the consequences of the bank crisis 
- professionalization of debt advise 
- Evaluation and impact of debt advise services 
- legal debt regulation
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: The Association's purposes are to bring together a broad range of actors in the fight against over-indebtedness and financial exclusion and to facilitate the exchange of information on these matters connected with their legal and economical aspects and all initiatives at European and national levels.
relevant_communication: - Conference on professionalization of debt advise and the consequences of cashless society,  Bratislava/Slowakia, November/December 2016
